name: Thundering Sword Dragon, Angerblader
effect:
[ACT](VC):[COST][Put a rear-guard face down as an equip gauge for another rear-guard], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], [Stand] three of your rear-guards with three or more equip gauges each, and all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Deadheat Bullspike
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When your unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and move all of your force markers to that unit's circle.
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When the attack of your unit on a circle with a force marker does not hit, draw a card, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: True Demonic Rifle Rogue, Gunningcoleo
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, this unit gets [Power] +5000/drive +1 until end of turn. Then, put the top card of your opponent's deck into the drop zone, and if it is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +10000/drive +1 until end of turn.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1] grade 3], put the top card of your opponent's deck into the drop zone, and your opponent cannot call the same grade as that card from his or her hand until end of turn.

name: Destruction Dragon, Dark Rex
effect:
[ACT](Drop zone):If your vanguard is grade 2 or greater, and you did not ride this turn, [COST][discard two equip gauges], and ride this card as [Stand] or call it to (RC).
[CONT](VC/RC):During the battle it attacked, this unit gets [Power] +2000 for each of your equip gauges.

name: Clearout Dragon, Sweeperacrocanto
effect:
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When it attacks a vanguard, put the top card of your deck face down as an equip gauge for this unit.
[CONT](RC):This unit gets [Power] +5000 for each of this unit's equip gauges, and if it has three or more equip gauges, it cannot be chosen by your opponent's card's abilities.

name: Bad End Dragger
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a rear-guard on the bottom of your deck], and this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1 until end of that battle.
[AUTO]:When rode upon, call this card to (RC), and retire all of your opponent's rear-guards in the column it was called to.

name: Powerback Renaldo
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a card from your hand into your soul], look at up to the same number of cards from the top of your deck as your vanguard's grade, call up to three cards from among them to (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Unrivaled Blade Rogue, Cyclomatooth
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. Then, put the top card of your opponent's deck into the drop zone, and if it is grade 1 or greater, this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
[AUTO]:When rode upon, your opponent chooses a card from his or her hand, discards it, and one of your vanguards gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each of that card's grades.

name: Spear-attack Mutant, Megalaralancer
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks a vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each of your opponent's [Rest] rear-guards. Then, [COST][put a rear-guard into your soul], and your opponent cannot intercept until end of turn.

name: Turbo Smilodon
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, or when it attacks a vanguard, you may put the top card of your deck face down as an equip gauge for one of your rear-guards.

name: Savage Academian
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Rest] this unit], and call one of this unit's equip gauge to (RC).

name: Sharp Thorn Dragon, Polacanspine
effect:
[AUTO]:When retired from (RC), activate all of the effects below according to the total number of your equip gauges.
・1 or more - [Soul-Charge 1].
・2 or more - [Counter-Charge 1].
・3 or more - Move all of this card's equip gauges to one of your other rear-guards.

name: Gunwild Wolf
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 3] grade 3 & put any number of your rear-guards on the bottom of your deck in any order], and until end of that battle, when your opponent would call cards from his or her hand to (GC), he or she must call the same number of cards as the number of cards put into your deck for this cost or more at the same time.

name: Derange Thaddeus
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and move all of your force markers to this unit's circle.
[AUTO](RC):When its attack hits, if this unit's circle has a force marker, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Snapper Devil
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When its attack hits, draw a card.
[AUTO](RC):When it boosts, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and move all of your force markers to the boosted unit's circle.

name: Seven Colors Mutant. Stagger Seven
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks a vanguard, if all fighters' units are [Rest], [COST][Counter-Blast 1], until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +20000, then, [COST][Soul-Blast 2] grade 3], your opponent chooses a card from his or her hand, discards it, and he or she can only call the same grade from his or her hand as the discarded card's grade.

name: Machining Ornamental
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [Rest] all other rear-guards, and resolve one of the effects below. [COST][Soul-Blast 1] grade 3 with "Machining" in its card name], and resolve both effects instead of one.
・Choose all [Rest] rear-guards, and they get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
・Your opponent can only [Stand] up to two units during his or her next stand phase.

name: Brawny Jerk
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +6000 until end of turn. Put the top card of your opponent's deck into the drop zone, and if it is grade 1 or greater, you [Soul-Charge 1].
[AUTO](RC):When it boosts a unit that attacked a grade 3 or greater vanguard, [COST][discard a card from your hand], your opponent chooses a card from his or her hand, and discards it.

name: Fiery Light Dragon, Opticalcerato
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, or when it attacks a vanguard, you may put the top card of your deck face down as an equip gauge for one of your rear-guards.

name: Deflagration Dragon, Bombraptor
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your opponent's rear-guard is retired during your turn, put the top card of your deck face down as an equip gauge for this unit, and you may have this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each of this unit's equip gauges.

name: Light Blade Dragon, Zandilopho
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][[Rest] this unit], choose one of your rear-guards, and put the top card of your deck face down as an equip gauge for that unit or move all of one of your rear-guard's equip gauges to that unit. Then, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and the chosen unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Angry Roar Dragon, Roarbaryo
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], put the top card of your deck face down as an equip gauge for one of your other rear-guards, and that unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each of its equip gauges.

name: Savage Priestess
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand.

name: Detonate Bahrel
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1] "Detonate Bahrel"], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Flareblast Coyote
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 9], until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +30000, and your opponent cannot call sentinels from his or her hand. At the end of that battle, put all of your rear-guards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Offensive Punter
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When it boosts, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, draw a card, and put this unit on the bottom of your deck.
[AUTO]:When rode upon, you may call this card to (RC).

name: Big Blow Ted
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][put a grade 2 or greater card from your drop zone on the bottom of your deck], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Sweetie Guard
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand.

name: Machining Centipede
effect: [ACT](VC/RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose the same number of your opponent's units as the number of your [Rest] rear-guards, and until end of your opponent's next turn, they lose "Twin Drive!!", "Intercept", "Boost", and cannot gain those skills. [Stand] this unit.

name: Hiding Killerleaf
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. Put the top card of your opponent's deck into the drop zone, and if it is grade 1 or greater, you draw a card.

name: Flowery Tearer
effect: [CONT](RC):If your opponent's card was put from the deck into the drop zone this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Machining Ladybomber
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Rest] this unit], choose any number of all fighters' rear-guards, and [Rest] them. If your opponent has three or less rear-guards, you [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Fowling Net Mutant, Splaseizer
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand.

name: Savage Mercenary
effect:
[CONT]:You cannot normal ride this card.
[CONT](RC):If you have no units with equip gauge in the same column as this unit, this unit cannot attack.

name: Armored Mammoth
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][discard all of this unit's equip gauges], and until end of that battle, when your opponent would call cards from his or her hand to (GC), he or she must call the same number of cards as the number of equip gauges discarded for this cost or more at the same time.

name: Savage Augur
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put an equip gauge on the bottom of your deck], and one of your units gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack it boosted hits a vanguard, [COST][discard a card from your hand or two equip gauges], and draw a card.

effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card.

effect: (You may only have up to four cards with "[Heal] HEAL" in a deck.)
